viewData.name: ASUS 14" R420SA Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy ASUS 14" R420SA Laptop featuring 1.6 GHz Intel Celeron N3060 Dual-Core, 4GB DDR3 | 32GB eMMC Storage 14" 1366 x 768 Anti-Glare Display. Review ASUS R420SA
viewData.long_description: The 14" R420SA Laptop from Asus is a basic system designed for everyday tasks such as browsing the internet, composing and editing documents, and streaming online videos. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 1.6 GHz Intel Celeron N3060 dual-core processor and 4GB of DDR3 RAM. Storage space is limited with only 32GB, so if you need additional room, you can attach storage solutions using its USB ports and microSD card reader.Its 14" display, driven by integrated Intel HD graphics, features a 1366 x 768 native resolution with an anti-glare coating. It also has an HDMI port that lets you connect an external display for enhanced multitasking and larger viewing. Other integrated features included 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.1, a webcam, a microphone, speakers, and an audio in/out jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Home.
